fields.text: Digital innovation has never been a strong suit of the healthcare industry—especially when it comes to customer care. The process should all be accessible on one centralized platform and companies are beginning to take notice.

item.title: A Conversation With HomeMe: How An Agile Startup Tests With Applause
item.description: Watch how West Coast startup, HomeMe, leverages Applause to help with their agile testing needs.

fields.text: Learn how this West Coast startup leverages Applause testing solutions to extend their internal QA team and fix bugs that would normally go unseen.
Contact us today to make sure your digital capabilities drive great customer experiences and generate loyalty.

metaGlobalVars.seoDescription: Learn how this West Coast startup leverages Applause testing solutions to extend their internal QA team and fix bugs that would normally go unseen.

item.title: Runkeeper
item.description: See how Runkeeper leverages the scalability of Applause to test its app with real runners.

fields.text: Make sure your digital capabilities drive great customer experiences and generate loyalty.

Discover how by partnering with Applause, Runkeeper was able to expand the breadth of devices, operating systems, and cellular service providers it wanted to cover in its testing. We sit down with Ben Bates, former head of QA, explain how Runkeeper scaled its QA to continue delivering high quality digital experiences to its running community throughout the process of rapid growth

metaGlobalVars.seoDescription: Discover how Runkeeper was able to expand the breadth of devices, operating systems, and cellular service providers it wanted to cover in its testing.

item.title: Blueport Commerce
item.description: See how Blueport Commerce leverages Applause to improve omnichannel experiences across all devices.

fields.text: Creating a great experience for users has always been an element that was nice-to-have rather than a requirement. Discover how Blueport Commerce, an eCommerce platform that powers omni-channel shopping for furniture retailers all across America, relies on Applause to test branded websites for all of their clients, in every market with real people using real devices.
Contact us today to make sure your digital capabilities drive great customer experiences and generate loyalty.

metaGlobalVars.seoDescription: Discover how Blueport Commerce, an eCommerce platform that powers omni-channel shopping for furniture retailers all across America.
